title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.29 - Miscellaneous pork products
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.29 - Miscellaneous pork products

State Regulations

Partially defatted pork fatty tissue. "Partially Defatted Pork Fatty Tissue" is a pork by-product derived from the
low temperature rendering (not exceeding 120 degrees Fahrenheit) of fresh pork
fatty tissue, exclusive of skin. Such product shall have a pinkish color and a
fresh odor and appearance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
319.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
